Class Circle

java.lang.Object
  




public class Circle
extends java.lang.Object

Class Circle: defines a circle of a given radius, color, center position, with the following functionalities.

Version:
2011
Author:
IIP-PRG English group

Constructor Summary
Circle()
          create a Circle of radius 50, black and center in (100,100).
Circle(double r, java.lang.String c, int px, int py)
          create a Circle of radius r, color c and center in (px,py).
